moves.1. d4: im posting this annotation for a serious question about my opening, i need to see which of a certain move is better.

or

moves.3... d5 4. c4 c6: that is an ugly pawn structure he has right there. all we know is that the c bishop isn't going anywhere anytime soon

moves.5... Ng4 6. Ne5 Nxe5 7. dxe5 Qg5: just an fyi. for the first time in one of my annotations: I take the queen through skill, not error. look for that around move 20.
moves.8... Qh4+ 9. g3: now i have an uglier pawn structure. this guy knows how to take people into middle game, I'll give him that.
moves.10. Qb3: kind of a stupid move because the bishop can't really move anywhere.
moves.11. Qxc4: as long as my queen is out, I might as well take advantage of the situation.
moves.11... Be7: develop and preparing for a castle. as you can see, my castiling ability is ... devastated.
moves.12. Nc3 b5: oops. thats a mistake. a big one, two.
or did he just forget en passent?
moves.14... Bxf6: was bishop take the best move?
moves.15. Nxb5: this is just amazing. you have to watch this (the games already coming to an end) and that a8 rook is (as good as) dead
moves.15... Bb7: i thought that might happen... so:
moves.16... Kf7: now I COULD take the rook and be done with it. OR i could push the king a bit further. this is just awesome: watch this.
moves.17... Kg6: i see a future pin coming.

this is just amazing. take a minute to absorb this.
